wiDrPROy3XgMblfO.name: Aeriel - Intermediate Affinity
wiDrPROy3XgMblfO.description:
Attack Ability: 250
Block Ability: 250
Initiative: 120

Silfur: +15 Quality Lance, it has Base Damage 120 and uses the Cut and Cold Attack Types. When used in a charge it's Base Damage becomes 170. It can damage any creature regardless of its special immunities.

Srebro: +20 Quality Longbow with infinite ammunition, it has Base Damage 100 and uses the Thrust Attack Type, Srebro has a range of 1 mile / 1,500km and suffers no penalty for shooting more than half of its attack range. Its arrows can damage any creature regardless of their special immunities.

Arc Attack: The Invoker can perform an alternative attack with Silfur, granting it a large scythe-like appearance and allowing its attacks to strike all creatures within 15ft / 5m.

Argent Light: Once per Minute, the Invoker can perform a special charge attack with Silfur. First the Invoker must ride in a straight line for at least 1 Turn prior, then when making the attack the Invoker charges in that same line a distance of 500ft / 175m, gaining +100 to the Invoker's Attack ability and making an attack on any creature passed through in the charge.

Essence of Light: Creatures based on darkness or negative emotions receive double damage from the Invoker.

Amber: While Incarnated, the Invoker is automatically mounted on a supernatural creature with Damage Resistance 2,000 as well as AT 4 against all attacks and 14 in all physical characteristics, the Invoker cannot be separated or unmounted from Amber while Incarnated.

Supernatural Protection: Both the Invoker and Amber have a Damage Barrier of 80.

Master Rider: The Invoker suffers no penalties for fighting while riding, and can automatically pass any Ride Difficulty check of 240 or less.

5yKnh5oGDsDGvMZ9.name: Aeriel - Minor Affinity
5yKnh5oGDsDGvMZ9.description:
Attack Ability: 190
Block Ability: 190
Initiative: 100

Silfur: +10 Quality Lance, it has Base Damage 100 and uses the Cut and Cold Attack Types. When used in a charge it's Base Damage becomes 150. It can damage any creature regardless of its special immunities.

Arc Attack: The Invoker can perform an alternative attack with Silfur, granting it a large scythe-like appearance and allowing its attacks to strike all creatures within 15ft / 5m.

Essence of Light: Creatures based on darkness or negative emotions receive double damage from the Invoker.

Amber: While Incarnated, the Invoker is automatically mounted on a supernatural creature with Damage Resistance 2,000 as well as AT 4 against all attacks and 14 in all physical characteristics, the Invoker cannot be separated or unmounted from Amber while Incarnated.

Supernatural Protection: Both the Invoker and Amber have a Damage Barrier of 80.

Master Rider: The Invoker suffers no penalties for fighting while riding, and can automatically pass any Ride Difficulty check of 240 or less.

3ZRLWFfibcMTzR7t.name: Aeriel - Real Affinity
3ZRLWFfibcMTzR7t.description:
Attack Ability: 300
Block Ability: 300
Initiative: 140

Silfur: +20 Quality Lance, it has Base Damage 130 and uses the Cut and Cold Attack Types. When used in a charge it's Base Damage becomes 180. It can damage any creature regardless of its special immunities.

Srebro: +20 Quality Longbow with infinite ammunition, it has Base Damage 100 and uses the Thrust Attack Type, Srebro has a range of 1 mile / 1,500km and suffers no penalty for shooting more than half of its attack range. Its arrows can damage any creature regardless of their special immunities.

Zelba: +20 Quality Long Sword, it has Base Damage 120 and uses the Cut Attack Type. This weapon ignores the defender's AT and produces automatic criticals when it hits. Against Damage Resistance creatures it treats the whole body as a vulnerable point. It can damage any creature regardless of its special immunities.

Aura of Kings: Anyone who attacks the Invoker and is not immune to psychological states must pass a 180 Composure check or suffer a -60 to their Attack ability for that attack.

Arc Attack: The Invoker can perform an alternative attack with Silfur, granting it a large scythe-like appearance and allowing its attacks to strike all creatures within 15ft / 5m.

Argent Light: Once per Minute, the Invoker can perform a special charge attack with Silfur. First the Invoker must ride in a straight line for at least 1 Turn prior, then when making the attack the Invoker charges in that same line a distance of 500ft / 175m, gaining +100 to the Invoker's Attack ability and making an attack on any creature passed through in the charge.

Essence of Light: Creatures based on darkness or negative emotions receive double damage from the Invoker.

Amber: While Incarnated, the Invoker is automatically mounted on a supernatural creature with Damage Resistance 2,000 as well as AT 4 against all attacks and 14 in all physical characteristics, the Invoker cannot be separated or unmounted from Amber while Incarnated.

Supernatural Protection: Both the Invoker and Amber have a Damage Barrier of 80.

Master Rider: The Invoker suffers no penalties for fighting while riding, and can automatically pass any Ride Difficulty check of 240 or less.

JdzYltjDabB5E3FB.name: Ambrose Magus - Intermediate Affinity
JdzYltjDabB5E3FB.description:
Magic Projection: 160
Initiative: 90

Archmage - Minor: Each Turn the Invoker can use two of the Incarnation's abilities with "Magic" in their name, this can either be the same ability twice or two different abilities. Abilities that mention a Zeon Cost do not actually reduce the Invoker's zeon.

Mystical Lightning - Magic: The Invoker creates a spell that produces a bolt of energy with Base Damage 50 using the Electric Attack Type. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Mystic Shield - Magic: The Invoker creates a supernatural shield that can protect against any attack using a 300 Lp barrier. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Mystic Seal - Magic: The Invoker casts a Spiritual Spell against the Energy AT, a result of damage subjects the target to a 120 MR Resistance Check with failure sealing all magical powers for a number of hours equal to the level of failure. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Mystic Transportation - Magic: The Invoker uses a Zeon Cost 50 teleportation effect, moving a distance of 150ft / 50m.

Mystic Breaker - Magic: Once per Turn as a Passive action, the Invoker can counter a spell with a Zeon Cost of 50 or less, this ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Matrix Breaker - Magic: Once per Turn as a Passive action, the Invoker can counter a psychic power with a Psychic Potential of 140 or less, this ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Energize - Magic: A person chosen by the Invoker gains +10 AAP and can damage energy until the start of the Invoker's next Turn.

Mystical Empowerment - Magic: The Invoker gains +20 Magic Potential until the end of the Turn.

Mysticism - Intermediate: The Invoker gains a Final ability of 180 in Occult, Magic Appraisal and Style.

Magic Eye: The Invoker can see magic and spirits

Supernatural Resistance: The Invoker gains +40 MR.

Flying Wizard: The Invoker gets a Flight Value of 8.

VHbR6iZ88HZUpnKd.name: Ambrose Magus - Minor Affinity
VHbR6iZ88HZUpnKd.description:
Magic Projection: 140
Initiative: 80

Archmage - Minor: Each Turn the Invoker can use two of the Incarnation's abilities with "Magic" in their name, this can either be the same ability twice or two different abilities. Abilities that mention a Zeon Cost do not actually reduce the Invoker's zeon.

Mystical Lightning - Magic: The Invoker creates a spell that produces a bolt of energy with Base Damage 50 using the Electric Attack Type. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Mystic Shield - Magic: The Invoker creates a supernatural shield that can protect against any attack using a 300 Lp barrier. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Mystic Seal - Magic: The Invoker casts a Spiritual Spell against the Energy AT, a result of damage subjects the target to a 120 MR Resistance Check with failure sealing all magical powers for a number of hours equal to the level of failure. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Mystic Transportation - Magic: The Invoker uses a Zeon Cost 50 teleportation effect, moving a distance of 150ft / 50m.

Mysticism - Minor: The Invoker gains a Final ability of 120 in Occult, Magic Appraisal and Style.

Magic Eye: The Invoker can see magic and spirits

Supernatural Resistance: The Invoker gains +40 MR.

ylKlEhS4aZnPMvtg.description:

140+ Occult and Magic Appraisal / +20

JLy9qC3kCJdZE0P2.name: Ambrose Magus - Real Affinity
JLy9qC3kCJdZE0P2.description:
Magic Projection: 190
Initiative: 110

Archmage - Real: Each Turn the Invoker can use three of the Incarnation's abilities with "Magic" in their name, this can either be the same ability three times or three different abilities. The Invoker can instead use a single "Magic Magic" ability if they choose. Abilities that mention a Zeon Cost do not actually reduce the Invoker's zeon.

Mystical Lightning - Magic: The Invoker creates a spell that produces a bolt of energy with Base Damage 50 using the Electric Attack Type. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Mystic Shield - Magic: The Invoker creates a supernatural shield that can protect against any attack using a 300 Lp barrier. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Mystic Seal - Magic: The Invoker casts a Spiritual Spell against the Energy AT, a result of damage subjects the target to a 120 MR Resistance Check with failure sealing all magical powers for a number of hours equal to the level of failure. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Mystic Transportation - Magic: The Invoker uses a Zeon Cost 50 teleportation effect, moving a distance of 150ft / 50m.

Mystic Breaker - Magic: Once per Turn as a Passive action, the Invoker can counter a spell with a Zeon Cost of 50 or less, this ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Matrix Breaker - Magic: Once per Turn as a Passive action, the Invoker can counter a psychic power with a Psychic Potential of 140 or less, this ability acts like a Zeon Cost 50 effect.

Energize - Magic: A person chosen by the Invoker gains +10 AAP and can damage energy until the start of the Invoker's next Turn.

Mystical Empowerment - Magic: The Invoker gains +20 Magic Potential until the end of the Turn.

Wave of Magic - Major Magic: The Invoker releases a 80ft / 25m Area blast of magic with Base Damage 100 that uses the Energy Attack Type. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 120 effect.

Power Barrier - Major Magic: The Invoker gains a supernatural shield until the end of the Turn with 1,500 LP. This ability acts like a Zeon Cost 120 effect.

Mysticism - Real: The Invoker gains a Final ability of 240 in Occult, Magic Appraisal and Style.

Magic Eye: The Invoker can see magic and spirits

Supernatural Resistance: The Invoker gains +40 MR.

Flying Wizard: The Invoker gets a Flight Value of 8.

YYBMgqSTmFDTQP6a.name: Anassilish - Intermediate Affinity
YYBMgqSTmFDTQP6a.description:
Attack Ability: 150
Dodge Ability: 150
Magic Projection: 130
Initiative: 60
Masks Available: Clay, Wood, Iron, Ivory, Gold

Mask: The Invoker gains the benefit of a specific Mask while Incarnated, all higher Affinities have access to the Masks from lower affinities, during Initiative, the Invoker can change the Mask being used via a Passive action.

Iron Mask - Tyranny
Attack +10, Dodge -10, Initiative +0

Hades: +10 Quality Chain, it has Base Damage 50 and uses the Impact Attack Type. It can be used as a Trapping weapon with a Strength of 10. Hades can damage energy.

Oppressive Chains: The Invoker can perform Trapping attacks with only a -20 penalty, each turn Hades has trapped someone, its trapping strength is increased by 1 point to a maximum of Strength 16.

Transmit Agony: After successfully Trapping someone, the Invoker can use this power to apply an Automatic Effect at the cost of 1 Fatigue. The Target must make a PhR check vs a value of 100 + Damage Dealt to the target via the Invoker. Failure results in LP Loss equal to the Failure level.

Iron Mask: The Invoker gains a Damage Barrier of 80, +40 PhR and can obtain Inhuman Check results.

Ivory Mask - Purity
Initiative -20

Olympus: +10 Quality Longbow with unlimited ammunition, it has Base Damage 60 and uses the Thrust Attack Type. It can damage energy.

Sigma: Those who take damage by Olympus's arrows must pass a 140 MR Resistance Check or suffer the Fascination state for 10 Turns, during which they cannot perform Active actions.

Golden Mask - Authority
Attack +10, Dodge +10, Initiative -10

Staff of Kings: +10 Quality Staff with a Base Damage 60, it uses the Impact Attack Type and can damage energy.

King: Those who look at the Invoker for at least 2 Turns consecutively while wearing the Golden Mask must make a 100 MR Resistance Check or suffer the Fascination state until they look away from the Mask for a Full Turn or pass the MR Check. Those who continue to pass the check and maintain looking at the Mask must make the next check at +5 to the MR difficulty to a maximum of 140 MR.

Golden Mask: The Invoker gains +50 to any Resistance check against control and manipulation effects.

Monarch: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 180 in Leadership, Intimidate and Style.

o3hstjsZvWYx0uVx.name: Anassilish - Minor Affinity
o3hstjsZvWYx0uVx.description:
Attack Ability: 100
Dodge Ability: 100
Magic Projection: 90
Initiative: 40
Masks Available: Clay, Wood

Mask: The Invoker gains the benefit of a specific Mask while Incarnated, all higher Affinities have access to the Masks from lower affinities, during Initiative, the Invoker can change the Mask being used via a Passive action.

Clay Mask - Impurity
Attack +20, Dodge -10, Initiative -10

Kalidus: +5 Quality Scythe, it has Base Damage 60 and uses the Cut Attack Type.

Amplify Pain: Penalties caused by the Invoker's Criticals are doubled.

Reaper: When the Invoker kills someone they gain twice the current victim's Zeon points.

Bleed: All of Kalidus's attacks can cause bleeding to those who can bleed.

Wooden Mask - Stability
Attack, Dodge, Initiative - Unchanged

Daldevar: +5 Quality Quarterstaff, it has Base Damage 40 and uses the Impact Attack Type.

Defensive Style: When the Invoker uses the Pure Defense action, the bonus to their Defense ability is +50 instead of +30.

Multiple Defense: The Invoker can use their full ability to defend themselves twice per Turn before the penalty for multiple defenses is applied, from that point a third attack is considered the second for Defense penalties (-30).

Strength of Wood: The Invoker gains +20 LP and +10 PhR.

X0nAKnEzOQZ3snVV.name: Anassilish - Modifiers
X0nAKnEzOQZ3snVV.description:
D'anjayni or D'anjayni Nephilim / +10
Use Different Combat Styles / +10
Disguise 180+ / +20
Unnoticable Personality / +30
1+ Anassilish Possessions / +60
Have No Name / +150
-------------------------
Tell People Your True Name / -10
Unable to Adapt or Change / -20
Strong Personality / -20
Have Your Identity Known / -60

enHjKQAOI2ApEtMm.name: Anassilish - Real Affinity
enHjKQAOI2ApEtMm.description:
Attack Ability: 200
Dodge Ability: 190
Magic Projection: 160
Initiative: 80
Masks Available: Clay, Wood, Iron, Ivory, Gold, Platinum

Mask: The Invoker gains the benefit of a specific Mask while Incarnated, all higher Affinities have access to the Masks from lower affinities, during Initiative, the Invoker can change the Mask being used via a Passive action.

Platinum Mask - Heroism
Attack, Dodge, Initiative - Unchanged

Ashurian: +15 Quality Long Sword, it has Base Damage 70 and uses the Cut Attack Type. This weapon has the Precision trait.

He Who Always Rises: Any penalty the Invoker receives while the Platinum Mask is active is removed at the end of the Invoker's turn.

Invincible: Each turn while the Platinum Mask is active, up to 25 LP and 1 Fatigue is recovered as long as they were lost while the Platinum Mask was worn.

wi7LmzTvAEqjPgWm.name: Arturia - Intermediate Affinity
wi7LmzTvAEqjPgWm.description:
Attack Ability: 110
Dodge Ability: 110
Initiative: 100

Bestial Jaws and Claws: The Invoker gains natural weapons, with Base Damage 80 that ignore 3 points of the defender's AT. They use the Cut and Thrust Attack Types.

Bestial Characteristics - Intermediate: The Invoker's Strength, Agility and Constitution is raised to 12 and they can take Inhuman actions.

Beast - Intermediate: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 150 in Intimidate, Swim, Athleticism, Jump, Climb and Withstand Pain.

Animal Senses: The Invoker gains Acute Vision and Night Vision Advantages.

Animal Nature: The Invoker gains the Animal Affinity Advantage.

Beast Skin: The Invoker gains AT 4 against all attacks excluding Energy.

SOZS57FtaTGyLNTi.name: Arturia - Minor Affinity
SOZS57FtaTGyLNTi.description:

Initiative: 70

Bestial Characteristics - Minor: The Invoker's Strength, Agility and Constitution is raised to 10.

Beast - Minor: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 120 in Intimidate, Swim, Athleticism, Jump, Climb and Withstand Pain.

Animal Nature: The Invoker gains the Animal Affinity Advantage.

Beast Skin: The Invoker gains AT 4 against all attacks excluding Energy.

art6XmD8ShKc8prD.description:
Attack Ability: 170
Dodge Ability: 170
Initiative: 130

Bestial Jaws and Claws: The Invoker gains natural weapons, with Base Damage 100 that ignore 5 points of the defender's AT. They use the Cut and Thrust Attack Types.

Bestial Characteristics - Real: The Invoker's Strength, Agility and Constitution is raised to 13 and they can take Inhuman actions.

Beast - Real: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 200 in Intimidate, Swim, Athleticism, Jump, Climb and Withstand Pain.

Animal Senses: The Invoker gains Acute Vision and Night Vision Advantages.

Animal Nature: The Invoker gains the Animal Affinity Advantage.

Beast Skin: The Invoker gains AT 4 against all attacks excluding Energy.

HPrikct4kPbGF1Xr.name: Eiko - Intermediate Affinity
HPrikct4kPbGF1Xr.description:
Attack Ability: 200
Block Ability: 150
Initiative: 35

Oni Blood - Intermediate: While Incarnated, the Invoker gains +100 LP and +50 PhR and is considered to have a minimum Strength of 12 when determining how much they can carry.

Demon's Daughter: The Invoker gains the Disquieting Advantage

Chinomi: +15 Quality Tetsubo with Base Damage 120, it uses the Impact and Electricity Attack types and can damage energy.

Funkei: Natural Armor Layer granting 3 AT to Physical Attack Types and 6 AT against the Energy Attack Type.

Inazuma: Once per Minute while outdoors, the Invoker can call forth a blast of lightning to attack an enemy within 600ft / 200m. This targets the Electricity AT and has Base Damage 100.

Sukketsu: Once per Minute, Chinomi is empowered for 1 Turn, gaining +40 Attack ability and Base Damage, +20 to Critical Level and causes 50% of damage dealt to opponents to recover the Invoker's HP, this value is divided by the DR multiplier of Damage Resistant creatures.

Unstoppable - Intermediate: The Invoker gains a Final ability of 180 in Composure, Feats of Strength and Withstand Pain.

Eyes of the Night: The Invoker gains the Night Vision Advantage

Jigoku Shoujo: The Invoker can perform Inhuman actions.

gQGSlQVA5CJf5UIe.name: Eiko - Minor Affinity
gQGSlQVA5CJf5UIe.description:
Attack Ability: 150
Block Ability: 100
Initiative: 20

Oni Blood - Minor: While Incarnated, the Invoker gains +30 LP and +25 PhR and is considered to have a minimum Strength of 11 when determining how much they can carry.

Chinomi: +5 Quality Tetsubo with Base Damage 100, it uses the Impact and Electricity Attack types.

Funkei: Natural Armor Layer granting 3 AT to Physical Attack Types and 6 AT against the Energy Attack Type.

Unstoppable - Minor: The Invoker gains a Final ability of 140 in Composure, Feats of Strength and Withstand Pain.

Eyes of the Night: The Invoker gains the Night Vision Advantage

Jigoku Shoujo: The Invoker can perform Inhuman actions.

FkKbbj5nInPc8bRL.name: Eiko - Modifiers
FkKbbj5nInPc8bRL.description:
Member of the Asakura Clan / +10
Female / +10
Irrepressible Desire / +20
Oni Blooded / +50
1+ Eiko Possessions / +40
Own Chinomi / +140
-------------------------
Conspire Against Allies / -20
Abuse the Weak / -20
Fail to Show Compassion / -60
Act without Honor / -100

k7qXOzKNcaYwL10f.name: Eiko - Real Affinity
k7qXOzKNcaYwL10f.description:
Oni Blood - Real: While Incarnated, the Invoker gains +200 LP and +75 PhR and is considered to have a minimum Strength of 14 when determining how much they can carry.

Demon's Daughter: The Invoker gains the Disquieting Advantage

Chinomi: +20 Quality Tetsubo with Base Damage 140, it uses the Impact and Electricity Attack types and can damage energy.

Funkei: Natural Armor Layer granting 3 AT to Physical Attack Types and 6 AT against the Energy Attack Type.

Unstoppable Fiend: When rolling initiative, the Invoker can spend 1 Fatigue Point to enter an Unstoppable state for the turn, preventing a loss of Active actions from going on the defensive, unless the attack recieved was a Critical.

Inazuma: Once per Minute while outdoors, the Invoker can call forth a blast of lightning to attack an enemy within 600ft / 200m. This targets the Electricity AT and has Base Damage 100.

Inazuma Tenshou: By spending 1 Fatigue Point on an attack, the Invoker can instead release a destructive shockwave in a line up to 30ft / 10m in length. This targets the Impact AT and has Base Damage 120, anyone struck recieves a Strength 14 Impact.

Sukketsu: Once per Minute, Chinomi is empowered for 1 Turn, gaining +40 Attack ability and Base Damage, +20 to Critical Level and causes 50% of damage dealt to opponents to recover the Invoker's HP, this value is divided by the DR multiplier of Damage Resistant creatures.

Unstoppable - Real: The Invoker gains a Final ability of 240 in Composure, Feats of Strength and Withstand Pain.

Eyes of the Night: The Invoker gains the Night Vision Advantage

Jigoku Shoujo: The Invoker can perform Inhuman actions.

gxdBt7z3O91wtyPr.name: Gygjur - Intermediate Affinity
gxdBt7z3O91wtyPr.description:
Attack Ability: 250
Block Ability: 250
Initiative: 60

Nothung: +15 Quality Two-Handed Axe, it has Base Damage 130 and uses the Cut and Cold Attack Types.

Dragon Skin - Intermediate: The Invoker reduces the Base Damage of incoming attacks by 20.

Unstoppable Force: The first time each round the Invoker is put on the defensive, it can be ignored, any successful attacks after will place the Invoker on the defensive however.

Combat Form: Once per Incarnation, for a period of 10 Turns the Invoker gains Strength 15, +20 Base Damage, AT 6 against any attack at the cost of -30 Initiative and -2 Movement Value.

Dragonslayer: Attacks to Size 25 or greater beings deal double damage.

Eternal Blood: The Invoker has the Eternal Blood legacy while Incarnated.

Inhuman Force: The Invoker's minimum Strength becomes 13, and Strength-based actions can achieve Inhuman Difficulty results.

7smiEZoD4E4IlEpY.name: Gygjur - Minor Affinity
7smiEZoD4E4IlEpY.description:
Attack Ability: 170
Block Ability: 170
Initiative: 40

Nothung: +10 Quality Two-Handed Axe, it has Base Damage 120 and uses the Cut and Cold Attack Types.

Dragon Skin - Minor: The Invoker reduces the Base Damage of incoming attacks by 10.

Unstoppable Force: The first time each round the Invoker is put on the defensive, it can be ignored, any successful attacks after will place the Invoker on the defensive however.

Dragonslayer: Attacks to Size 25 or greater beings deal double damage.

Eternal Blood: The Invoker has the Eternal Blood legacy while Incarnated.

Inhuman Force: The Invoker's minimum Strength becomes 13, and Strength-based actions can achieve Inhuman Difficulty results.

-------------------------

Size 19 or Less / -40

Fear Death / -100

VkymzElwRgHuXIFz.name: Gygjur - Real Affinity
VkymzElwRgHuXIFz.description:
Attack Ability: 320
Block Ability: 320
Initiative: 80

Nothung: +20 Quality Two-Handed Axe, it has Base Damage 140 and uses the Cut and Cold Attack Types.

Dragon Skin - Intermediate: The Invoker reduces the Base Damage of incoming attacks by 20.

Unstoppable Force: The first time each round the Invoker is put on the defensive, it can be ignored, any successful attacks after will place the Invoker on the defensive however.

Combat Form: Once every Incarnation, for a period of 10 Turns the Invoker gains Strength 15, +20 Base Damage, AT 6 against any attack at the cost of -30 Initiative and -2 Movement Value.

Insensitive: The Invoker ignores penalties to actions caused by physical or supernatural effects and powers.

Shadow of Destruction: Once every 10 Turns, during Initiative the Invoker can declare the activation of this power, for this turn the Invoker may make up to 5 attacks at full Attack ability.

Dragonslayer: Attacks to Size 25 or greater beings deal double damage.

Eternal Blood: The Invoker has the Eternal Blood legacy while Incarnated.

Inhuman Force: The Invoker's minimum Strength becomes 13, and Strength-based actions can achieve Inhuman Difficulty results.

txtYfqylRViLHtGG.name: Holst - Intermediate Affinity
txtYfqylRViLHtGG.description:
Attack Ability: 310
Block Ability: 310
Initiative: 120

Mournehaven: +15 Quality Bastard Sword, it has Base Damage 120 and uses the Impact and Cut Attack Types. It can damage any kind of creature ignoring their immunities.

Uruz's Gift: +20 Quality Longbow, it has Base Damage 100 and uses the Thrust Attack Type. It is stocked with nine arrows and can only perform one attack per Turn. This weapon can damage any kind of creature and when it's fired, its arrows gain the effect of the Perfect Target spell cast at Intermediate level.

Understand the Supernatural: After receiving melee damage from the same enemy twice within a single combat, the Invoker gains a +40 bonus to defense against that enemy's attacks hereafter.

Transcend Destiny: Once every 10 Turns, the Invoker can force a single attack or defense roll they make to achieve an open roll regardless of its actual number, this must be declared before the dice is rolled.

Dainself: Once every 10 Turns, the Invoker can perform a special attack with +50 to Attack ability. A result of damage subjects the target to a 140 MR Resistance Check, failure resulting in that individual's supernatural powers being sealed for a day.

The World's Choice: Once per Turn, the Invoker can reroll any die result, but must take the second number.

The Perfect Hero - Intermediate: The Invoker gains a Final ability of 200 in all Secondaries.

Charisma: The Invoker gains the Charmed Advantage.

Dragon's Blood: The Invoker gains a +50 bonus to PhR and MR.

More than Human: The Invoker's physical characteristics are considered to be 13 and Inhuman results are possible.

if4aN4KWvLxslAVv.description:
Attack Ability: 230
Block Ability: 230
Initiative: 90

Mournehaven: +15 Quality Bastard Sword, it has Base Damage 120 and uses the Impact and Cut Attack Types. It can damage any kind of creature ignoring their immunities.

Uruz's Gift: +20 Quality Longbow, it has Base Damage 100 and uses the Thrust Attack Type. It is stocked with nine arrows and can only perform one attack per Turn. This weapon can damage any kind of creature and when it's fired, its arrows gain the effect of the Perfect Target spell cast at Intermediate level.

The World's Choice: Once per Turn, the Invoker can reroll any die result, but must take the second number.

The Perfect Hero - Minor: The Invoker gains a Final ability of 140 in all Secondaries.

Charisma: The Invoker gains the Charmed Advantage.

Dragon's Blood: The Invoker gains a +50 bonus to PhR and MR.

More than Human: The Invoker's physical characteristics are considered to be 13 and Inhuman results are possible.

aQRiamJoBP6L5PNp.name: Holst - Real Affinity
aQRiamJoBP6L5PNp.description:
Attack Ability: 330
Block Ability: 330
Initiative: 140

Mournehaven: +15 Quality Bastard Sword, it has Base Damage 120 and uses the Impact and Cut Attack Types. It can damage any kind of creature ignoring their immunities.

Uruz's Gift: +20 Quality Longbow, it has Base Damage 100 and uses the Thrust Attack Type. It is stocked with nine arrows and can only perform one attack per Turn. This weapon can damage any kind of creature and when it's fired, its arrows gain the effect of the Perfect Target spell cast at Intermediate level.

Understand the Supernatural: After receiving melee damage from the same enemy twice within a single combat, the Invoker gains a +40 bonus to defense against that enemy's attacks hereafter.

Transcend Destiny: Once every 10 Turns, the Invoker can force a single attack or defense roll they make to achieve an open roll regardless of its actual number, this must be declared before the dice is rolled.

Dainself: Once every 10 Turns, the Invoker can perform a special attack with +50 to Attack ability. A result of damage subjects the target to a 140 MR Resistance Check, failure resulting in that individual's supernatural powers being sealed for a day.

Avalon: The final attack, the Invoker can declare the use of this power a single time per Incarnation. Once executed the Invoker makes a single attack with +200 to the Attack ability while doubling the Base Damage of the attack. Avalon ignores the defender's AT and produces an Automatic Critical if it inflicts damage. Once executed, the Invoker's Incarnation is terminated regardless of the remaining duration.

The World's Choice: Once per Turn, the Invoker can reroll any die result, but must take the second number.

The Perfect Hero - Intermediate: The Invoker gains a Final ability of 280 in all Secondaries.

Charisma: The Invoker gains the Charmed Advantage.

Dragon's Blood: The Invoker gains a +50 bonus to PhR and MR.

More than Human: The Invoker's physical characteristics are considered to be 13 and Inhuman results are possible.

1QotOTHfuMCxLXKr.name: Kha'nefer - Intermediate Affinity
1QotOTHfuMCxLXKr.description:
Attack Ability: 150
Block Ability: 150
Magic Projection: 150
Initiative: 65

Khopesh: +5 Quality Long Sword, it has Base Damage 60 and uses the Cut attack type.

Unholy Beam: Once per Turn the Invoker can perform an Independant Attack in the form of a supernatural beam using Magic Projection, this targets the Energy AT, has a Base Damage of 60 and functions as an Attack Spell that had a zeon cost of 50 (the Invoker pays no cost to perform this attack). A result of damage forces the enemy to make a 100 DR Resistance Check or suffer a -20 All Action Penalty.

Sand Blast: Once per Minute, the Invoker can release a supernatural attack using Magic Projection in the form of hot sand, it has Base Damage 80 and uses the Heat Attack Type.

Shield of Beetles: Once per Minute, the Invoker can defend themselves using a supernatural shield and their Magic Projection, generating a 600 LP barrier. This barrier lasts until destroyed and functions as if it had a zeon cost of 80. Those who physically attack the Invoker must pass a 120 VR Resistance Check or lose LP equal to twice the failure level.

Sharp Tongue - Intermediate: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 160 in Persuasion, Intimidate and Leadership.

Heat Resistance: The Invoker receives half damage from Heat Type attacks.

Eternal Body: The Invoker is considered to have the effects of the Use of Necessary Energy ki power.

Aura of Superiority: The Invoker gets the Disquieting Advantage.

Sharp Tongue - Minor: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 120 in Persuasion, Intimidate and Leadership.

cQCPiFaKE2zJ45cT.name: Kha'nefer - Real Affinity
cQCPiFaKE2zJ45cT.description:
Attack Ability: 200
Block Ability: 200
Magic Projection: 200
Initiative: 80

Khopesh: +15 Quality Long Sword, it has Base Damage 80 and uses the Cut and Heat Attack Types. Once per Minute the Invoker can select a person harmed by Khopesh and automatically afflict them with the In Flames state.

Unholy Beam: Once per Turn the Invoker can perform an Independant Attack in the form of a supernatural beam using Magic Projection, this targets the Energy AT, has a Base Damage of 60 and functions as an Attack Spell that had a zeon cost of 50 (the Invoker pays no cost to perform this attack). A result of damage forces the enemy to make a 100 DR Resistance Check or suffer a -20 All Action Penalty.

Sand Blast: Once per Minute, the Invoker can release a supernatural attack using Magic Projection in the form of hot sand, it has Base Damage 80 and uses the Heat Attack Type.

Swarm of Unholy Fire: Once per Minute, the Invoker can use their Magic Projection to release a blast of fire in a 80ft / 25m Area this attack can damage immaterial beings, has Base Damage 80, uses the Heat Attack Type and is considered to be a Zeon Cost 150 effect.

Shield of Beetles: Once per Minute, the Invoker can defend themselves using a supernatural shield and their Magic Projection, generating a 600 LP barrier. This barrier lasts until destroyed and functions as if it had a zeon cost of 80. Those who physically attack the Invoker must pass a 120 VR Resistance Check or lose LP equal to twice the failure level.

Scourge of the Desert: Anyone who comes into contact with the Invoker must pass a 120 MR Resistance Check or suffer LP loss equal to half the failure level, objects in contact with the Invoker must instead pass a 120 MR Resistance Check or melt away within a few Turns.

Sharp Tongue - Real: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 200 in Persuasion, Intimidate and Leadership.

Heat Resistance: The Invoker receives half damage from Heat Type attacks.

Eternal Body: The Invoker is considered to have the effects of the Use of Necessary Energy ki power.

Tormented Existence: The Invoker is considered Undead for the purpose of spell effects, is immune to damage caused by fire and heat and ignores Criticals and penalties applied by injury or a lack of physical needs.

Aura of Superiority: The Invoker gets the Disquieting Advantage.

xufVBnfzCXF3wlcw.name: Kristoff - Intermediate Affinity
xufVBnfzCXF3wlcw.description:
Attack Ability: 250
Block Ability: 200
Initiative: 90 (Archana) / -30 (Rusty Anchor)

Weapon Manifest: During Initiative, the Invoker must choose which weapon to wield for that turn, Archana uses the higher Initiative bonus and Rusty Anchor uses the lower Initiative bonus, the two weapons cannot be used in tandem during a single turn.

Rusty Anchor: +5 Quality Anchor and Chain, it has Base Damage 160 and uses the Cut and Impact Attack Types, the weapon can be thrown a distance of 60ft / 20m, however the Invoker can only attack with it once during the Turn it is thrown.

Archana: +5 Quality Saber, it has Base Damage 60 and uses the Cut and Thrust Attack Types.

Tiger Shark - Minor: Once per 5 Turns, the Invoker can release a shark shaped water blast to a target within 150ft / 50m, this attack uses the Impact Attack Type and has Base Damage 80. Those struck receive a Strength 8 Impact.

Anchors Down!: A single time while Incarnated, the Invoker can perform an attack on anyone within the Dark Fog excluding themself. Those in the Area suffer an automatic Final Attack of 240 and Base Damage 120 against the Impact AT, for the remainder of the invocation, the Dark Fog becomes hard to move in granting the penalties of a Crowded Space for anyone but the Invoker.

Fearsome Reputation: The Invoker gains the Disquieting Advantage

Dark Fog: At the moment of invocation, a 150ft / 50m Area around the Invoker becomes Dark Fog, this fog is fixed in place and vanishes when the invocation ends.

Pirate King - Intermediate: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 180 in Leadership, Navigation, Stealth, Acrobatics and Notice.

Tiger Shark - Minor: Once per 5 Turns, the Invoker can release a shark shaped water blast to a target within 150ft / 50m, this attack uses the Impact Attack Type and has Base Damage 80. Those struck receive a Strength 8 Impact.

Pirate King - Minor: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 140 in Leadership, Navigation, Stealth, Acrobatics and Notice.

Fearsome Reputation: The Invoker gains the Disquieting Advantage

Dark Fog: At the moment of invocation, a 150ft / 50m Area around the Invoker becomes Dark Fog, this fog is fixed in place and vanishes when the invocation ends.

Phantom Motion: Once per Turn + 1 Fatigue point, while the Invoker is within the Dark Fog they can teleport to any other location within the Dark Fog using this power.

Bliss Rose: +10 Quality Whip with Base Damage 60, it's Primary Attack Type is Thrust and the Secondary is Impact.

Electric Lash: Once per Minute, the Invoker can modify Bliss Rose for 1 turn. During this time it gains 150ft / 50m reach, strikes the Electricity Attack Type and has Base Damage 100.

Blitz: Once per Turn + 1 Fatigue Point, the Invoker can rapidly move to a location within 300ft / 100m.

Expand Wounds: The Invoker gains +40 to Critical Level when caused through Bloody Rose.

Jinx: Anyone in proximity of the Invoker is treated as having the Bad Luck Disadvantage.

s22YVzwC3yDfQn6x.name: Loly Ann - Intermediate Affinity
s22YVzwC3yDfQn6x.description:
Puppet: The Invoker is transformed into one of Loly Ann's puppets, determined by the Affinity chosen for the Incarnation, they use that puppets stats as if it was its own Incarnation. During Initiative, the Invoker can declare they want to change the puppet they are transformed into, they receive a -40 AAP for that turn as they adjust to their new body.

Puppet Queen: The Invoker can choose willing allies to turn into the puppets instead, in this case the Invoker acts as Loly Ann instead. Only a single ally can function as any one puppet per time.

Ren - The White Cat
Attack Ability: 120
Dodge Ability: 120
Initiative: 100

Paws: Natural weapons with Base Damage 60, they use the Cut Attack Type.

Seven Lives: Rather than dodging an attack, Ren can spend 1 Fatigue point for every 50 points of the attacker's final result to automatically avoid an attack.

Agile as a Cat: Ren gains an Agility of 10.

Plush Cat: Ren has a Final ability of 120 in Acrobatics, Athletics, Climb and Jump.

Dash - The Crocodile
Attack Ability: 150
Block Ability: 100
Initiative: 50

Bite: +5 Quality Natural weapon with Base Damage 80 that uses the Cut Attack Type.

Armoured Skin: Dash has AT 4 against all attacks.

Lash: By spending 1 Fatigue point, Dash performs a special attack with Base Damage 120, using the Impact Attack Type and causing a Strength 8 Impact.

3oielP6dD1SYsiQx.description:

Motobu - The Panda
Attack Ability: 170
Block Ability: 160
Initiative: 70

Invincible Self-Taught Style of a Thousand Agonies: Motobu's Unarmed attacks have Base Damage 50 and use the Impact Attack Type.

Martial Master: Once per Turn, Motobu can use one ability with "Technique" in its name.

Sublime Flying Sparrow Kick - Technique: Motobu can travel up to 150ft / 50m before performing a physical attack with Base Damage 100 using the Electric Attack Type.

Sixty Hands of Hell - Technique: Motobu can execute a ranged attack using its Attack ability. It has Base Damage 80, uses the Heat Attack Type and can damage immaterial beings.

Sated Dragon Belly - Technique: Motobu slams the target with its belly, causing Base Damage 100 with a Strength 12 Impact.

Strike of the Four Lotus Petals - Technique: A unique attack with Base Damage 50 that uses the Energy Attack Type. A result of damage lowers the target's Ki Accumulations by 1 for the next 10 Turns.

Serenity of the God of Jade - Technique: Motobu receives a +20 bonus to all Resistance Checks until the end of the Turn.

Steel Skin - Intermediate: While Incarnated the Invoker gains +200 LP.

Roth Zaxxon: The Invoker recieves no penalty for making two attacks a turn, and when making three attacks a -40 penalty is applied instead of -50.

Outstanding Defense: While the Invoker is wielding Claudius and attempting to defend another who has 25% of their LP or less, the Invoker gains +50 to their Defense ability, however they are unable to counterattack.

Silver Hand: The Invoker's attacks can harm any kind of supernatural being, the Invoker can touch supernatural things with their hands.

Light of Life: With a touch the Invoker can restore up to 50 HP to a creature, that creature can only benefit from this ability once every 24 hours.

Earthquake: Once per Minute, the Invoker can trade their ability to attack to instead create a shockwave, those in an Area of 150ft / 50m must pass an Agility 14 check or fall and be unable to stand for 3 Full Turns. Any structure with a Damage Barrier of 80 or less is destroyed.

Lillium Knowledge - Intermediate: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 180 in Animals, Herbal Lore, Medicine and Track.

OJRrGvHgePKSkf78.name: Ruatha - Real Affinity
OJRrGvHgePKSkf78.description:
Attack Ability: 300
Block Ability: 290
Initiative: 100

Mjolnir: +20 Quality Warhammer with Base Damage 120, it uses the Impact Attack Type. Enemies struck by this weapon automatically suffer a Strength 15 Impact, only the Invoker can hold this weapon in their hand. Beings with Gnosis 25+ receive double damage from this weapon.

Silver Hand: The Invoker's attacks can harm any kind of supernatural being, the Invoker can touch supernatural things with their hands.

Light of Life: With a touch the Invoker can restore up to 50 HP to a creature, that creature can only benefit from this ability once every 24 hours.

Giver of Life: At the cost of 50% of the Invoker's current LP, they can attempt to bring someone back to life who died less than 1 Minute prior. The target must pass a 140 PhR Resistance Check to revive and does not regain consciousness until 1 Week later.

Cry of the Lim Sidhe: Once per Minute, the Invoker can empower allies nearby who can hear their voice. Those allies receive a +10 All Action Bonus and become immune to the negative effects of any psychological state.

Earthquake: Once per Minute, the Invoker can trade their ability to attack to instead create a shockwave, those in an Area of 150ft / 50m must pass an Agility 14 check or fall and be unable to stand for 3 Full Turns. Any structure with a Damage Barrier of 80 or less is destroyed.

Lillium Knowledge - Real: The Invoker gets a Final ability of 240 in Animals, Herbal Lore, Medicine and Track.

G8MyHOq0iesairHA.name: Wang Shou Bo - Intermediate Affinity
G8MyHOq0iesairHA.description:
Attack Ability: 200
Dodge Ability: 190
Initiative: 140

Caress of the Lotus Blossom: The Invoker's Unarmed attacks produce Base Damage 60 and attack using the Energy Attack Type.

Fist of a Hundred Storms: The Invoker can replace their normal Unarmed attacks with a more aggressive style, this produces Base Damage 100, attacks using the Impact Attack Type and any criticals inflicted with this style gain +20 to their Critical Level.

Wind Rocks the Reeds: By spending 1 Fatigue point, the Invoker can modify one of their attacks to strike out at a range of 150ft / 50m. When doing this the attack uses the Impact Attack Type and requires a Very Hard Notice check to spot, otherwise the attack is invisible.

Strike of a Hundred Broken Bones: Once per Minute, the Invoker can execute a devastating attack, if it inflicts damage it produces an Automatic Critical, with +50 to the Critical Level.

Golden Monkey's Cunning - Intermediate: Before Initiative each Turn, the Invoker can declare a specific Attack or Defense roll to get a +40 bonus during that Turn. Alternatively, the Invoker can choose to give +20 to two separate rolls.

Martial Mastery: While Incarnated the Invoker is considered to possess Ki Control, Ki Detection (200), Erudition, Weight Elimination, Presence Extrusion, Use of Necessary Energy, Levitation, Energy Armor, Ki Transmission, Ki Healing and Zen.

Concentration of the Mantis Queen: The Invoker gets a +25 bonus to Resistance Checks against powers and abilities that target the Invoker's mind or senses.

Grace of the White Crane: The Invoker gains Movement Value 12.

Golden Monkey's Cunning - Minor: Before Initiative each Turn, the Invoker can declare a specific Attack or Defense roll to get a +10 bonus during that Turn.

Martial Knowledge: While Incarnated the Invoker is considered to possess Ki Control, Ki Detection (200), Erudition, Weight Elimination, Presence Extrusion and Use of Necessary Energy.

Caress of the Lotus Blossom: The Invoker's Unarmed attacks produce Base Damage 80 and attack using the Energy Attack Type.

Fist of a Hundred Storms: The Invoker can replace their normal Unarmed attacks with a more aggressive style, this produces Base Damage 120, attacks using the Impact Attack Type and any criticals inflicted with this style gain +20 to their Critical Level.

Wind Rocks the Reeds: By spending 1 Fatigue point, the Invoker can modify one of their attacks to strike out at a range of 150ft / 50m. When doing this the attack uses the Impact Attack Type and requires a Very Hard Notice check to spot, otherwise the attack is invisible.

Strike of a Hundred Broken Bones: Once per Minute, the Invoker can execute a devastating attack, if it inflicts damage it produces an Automatic Critical, with +50 to the Critical Level.

Faster than Wind: The first three attacks the Invoker makes each turn receive no additional attack penalty.

Golden Monkey's Cunning - Real: Before Initiative each Turn, the Invoker can declare a specific Attack or Defense roll to get a +60 bonus during that Turn. Alternatively, the Invoker can choose to give +20 to three separate rolls.

Martial Omniscience: While Incarnated the Invoker is considered to possess all Ki Abilities.

Concentration of the Mantis Queen: The Invoker gets a +25 bonus to Resistance Checks against powers and abilities that target the Invoker's mind or senses.
